title: swan97
author: swan97
content: Still very early with @TrumpCoinDTC.  Huge passive income potential if you get in early.  Trading volume is picking up and the reflections will be rolling in...#TrumpCoin  #TrumpCoinDTC  $dtc

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: swan97 on May 30, 2023, 07:38:23 PMStill very early with @TrumpCoinDTC.  Huge passive income potential if you get in early.  Trading volume is picking up and the reflections will be rolling in...#TrumpCoin  #TrumpCoinDTC  $dtcAre you part of the team of developers for this coin, or you are just trying to create hype around the projects because any project will promise such passive income for their early adopters but whether or not their meet to that promise has remained the major reason for worries and if I am not mistaken, this project will not be anything different from them all. But if you are an affiliate of a project member you should at least share more details that will give more insights into what we should be expecting for or to view the details of the project.Because sharing just a word and mentioning the name without the website will amount to wasting of your own time because nobody will be able to visit and check the project to know whether or not it is a potential coin.

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: I'm just an investor who got in early, but I have already made a good amount of money off the initial investment, and literally hundreds of dollars off reflections so far.  The reflections are in USDT and are generated off of a 5% sales tax.  Once the volume picks up, the passive income will be steady.  However, you'd want to get in early to take advantage of the surges...Quote from: Wiwo on May 30, 2023, 08:08:05 PMQuote from: swan97 on May 30, 2023, 07:38:23 PMStill very early with @TrumpCoinDTC.  Huge passive income potential if you get in early.  Trading volume is picking up and the reflections will be rolling in...#TrumpCoin  #TrumpCoinDTC  $dtcAre you part of the team of developers for this coin, or you are just trying to create hype around the projects because any project will promise such passive income for their early adopters but whether or not their meet to that promise has remained the major reason for worries and if I am not mistaken, this project will not be anything different from them all. But if you are an affiliate of a project member you should at least share more details that will give more insights into what we should be expecting for or to view the details of the project.Because sharing just a word and mentioning the name without the website will amount to wasting of your own time because nobody will be able to visit and check the project to know whether or not it is a potential coin.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: swan97 on May 30, 2023, 08:46:02 PMAre you part of the team of developers for this coin, or you are just trying to create hype around the projects because any project will promise such passive income for their early adopters but whether or not their meet to that promise has remained the major reason for worries and if I am not mistaken, this project will not be anything different from them all. But if you are an affiliate of a project member you should at least share more details that will give more insights into what we should be expecting for or to view the details of the project.Because sharing just a word and mentioning the name without the website will amount to wasting your own time because nobody will be able to visit and check the project to know whether or not it is a potential coin.This is good to hear that you already made a good return as an early investor, but whether or not this statement will appeal to my decision is what I can not guarantee you since I am already sceptical about the project since it projected passive income as it frontline promotion. Since we already know how unpredictable the market can be so there is no guarantee of a future increase in price unless a project has a clear use case and an ecosystem to support its growth.

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: Yes, you are correct.  Just trying to share my experience

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: swan97 on May 30, 2023, 08:53:48 PMYes, you are correct.  Just trying to share my experienceOn nice to see you accept the fact that you are trying to share your experience to gain knowledge from others but then the way you placed the whole thread make it look as if you are trying to promote that particular coin despite knowing that altcoin projects are. Mostly unpredictable and unreliable,  so advertising such cheat coins may mislead others into investing in them and causing possible losses to them. But then nice to see that you already clarify your stand on all this.

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: I am kind of shilling this, but I just made $17 in reflections today from both the buys and sells (in USDT).  Of course, I'd like it to go up in price, but the reflections are a consolation when it doesn't.  However, today it's up 13.9%.  NFA, DYOR.  Contract:  0xAb8c98491816FEde394582f7758A5eFfeb4368d7

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: Up 22% this weekend.  Reflections to date are $76.19 ($59 this weekend).Super bullish on this one...#TumpCoin, @TrumpCoinDTC, $DTCContract:  0xAb8c98491816FEde394582f7758A5eFfeb4368d7

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: swan97 on May 30, 2023, 07:38:23 PMStill very early with @TrumpCoinDTC.  Huge passive income potential if you get in early.  Trading volume is picking up and the reflections will be rolling in...#TrumpCoin  #TrumpCoinDTC  $dtcVery soon we will be hearing Biden UDTs and so many othwr coins in their manners, are they really getting us geeked or just to improvise on this to achieve their political careers, if we are to look into many of the coins, there's no long term plan for their existance than to be used for a little period of time just to achieve their target, how are we even sure that this is truly a Trump initiatives coin or the scammers are using gis name and reputation to run their own illicit scam in cryptocurrency, we need to conduct our research well before jumping into any digital coin.

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: Yea you are right.  I'm not planning on holding it too long, but it looks like it could be a quick profit once it has it's initial surge...Also, because of the reflections, I'm making USDT for every buy and sell, and so far it's been somewhat volatile.  (24hr volume is almost $700k, which is generates nice reflections because of the super low market cap.)

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: swan97 on May 30, 2023, 07:38:23 PMStill very early with @TrumpCoinDTC.  Huge passive income potential if you get in early.  Trading volume is picking up and the reflections will be rolling in...#TrumpCoin  #TrumpCoinDTC  $dtcMeme coin is already a shitshow. Ben.eth and company are monopolizing all the liquidity on the meme coins which makes the other meme coin illiquid that prone for rug pull. The loss on meme coin is tremendous that makes it more dangerous than gambling since Uniswap charge tons expensive fees while the price change more than 100% in just a short period of time due to low liquidity.Meme coin is ponzi. Even pepe coin is already struggling now to hold the current MC. It will collapse very quick along with low caps meme coin like this when the meme coin hype is over. This kind of investment is degen.

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: Yes, definitely shouldn't hold more than a few weeks.  It's definitely a gamble so timing is critical.  In this case, I'm hoping for a quick surge within a few weeks, then I'm out with a quick profit.  In the meantime, the reflections are making it less risky, because they are paid in USDT.

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: Yes, I agree, meme coins aren't for everyone.

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: I did some googling and I have found that Trumpcoin is the coin in your thread. You say that this is an opportunity to earn passive income. My question is what does your coin offer so that I get passive income? You just kind of invite us to join Trump Coin. Are you the developer of the coin? If so, why don't you provide some supporting data? If not, why are you talking about coins that have never been heard of before? Even search engines don't put your coins on the first page.Can you explain that to me?

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: Yes, someone else created a "Trump Coin" before this one launched.  They changed it to "Freedom Coin", so the google probably gave you that one.Here's the correct information:trumpcoindtc.com,  #TumpCoin, @TrumpCoinDTC, $DTCContract:  0xAb8c98491816FEde394582f7758A5eFfeb4368d7

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Another shitcoin on the BNB blockchain that trades on pancake? What is its great potential? I hope nobody needs to explain that you will not get rich with such coins, and the liquidity drop will happen very quickly and you will be left with a pile of garbage instead of tokens. Such shitcoins are published in the BNB network every day, but then they all die off happily. DYOR.

comments.author: swan97
comments.body: You are 100% right, however, you could make quick money off of a meme coin.  99.9% of them will be rugged, so get in during the hype phase, make your money and get out.  Timing is everything, and it's super high risk.  I'm not proposing this is a long time investment, but has potential for a quick profit, given the name, low market cap, reflections, and political climate.  dyor, nfa.
